author: cms-tau-pog
body:
#### PR description:

- adds boosted taus to nanoAOD, which is a backport of #33528
- configuration of input taus to anti-Ele-MVA-ID in runTauIdMVA.py had to be made configurable, which was missed in an earlier backport and is now consistent with other IDs in that file.
- modifier treatment in nano_cff was aligned with present structure which technically differs from master

#### PR validation:

passed code checks, unit tests, most limited matrix tests; remaining two matrix tests passed after adding the latest commit fixing the anit-Ele-MVA incompatibility

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

backport of #33528 needed for nanoAOD v9 production
title: Add boosted taus to nanoAOD (backport of #33528)
